title: Your Retirement ‘Credit Score,’ And Social Security’s
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Last week, the Alliance for Lifetime Income introduced a new online tool for assessing your retirement income readiness, akin to your credit score. Also last week, the Treasury Department issued its Social Security Trustees Reports, showing that just 16 years from now, Social Security’s funds will be insufficient to meet its obligations. The coincidence is relevant for anyone for whom Social Security will be an important part of their income in 2035 and beyond. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:summary:
Last week, the Alliance for Lifetime Income introduced a new online tool for assessing your retirement income readiness, akin to your credit score. Also last week, the Treasury Department issued its Social Security Trustees Reports, showing that just 16 years from now, Social Security’s funds will be insufficient to meet its obligations. The coincidence is relevant for anyone for whom Social Security will be an important part of their income in 2035 and beyond.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
